column2: 1: For sendmailR, it seems that you're having issues with the appending of port 25.  You should be able to specify the destination port via sendmail_options(smtpPort = 587)

2: If you'd like to invoke a Python script, this one looks most relevant.  You may find it easiest to do token substitution, i.e. take a base script, put in strings that you'll simply find (i.e. the tokens)
